alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:06PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will arrive in Southern Lake County over the next half hour... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Silver Springs Shores to 9 miles northeast of Dade City. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Lady Lake, and Mount Dora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
